title: Trailblazer League/Areas/Tirannwn

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Tirannwn Area covers the entirety of Tirannwn along with the Temple of Light and the Underground Pass. Underground areas and instanced areas with an entrance in the area are also included.

content:
The Tirannwn Area covers the entirety of Tirannwn along with the Temple of Light and the Underground Pass. Underground areas and instanced areas with an entrance in the area are also included.

Contents

  • 1 Overview of area
    • 1.1 Notable settlements
    • 1.2 Restricted travel
    • 1.3 Notable combat-related activities
    • 1.4 Notable non-combat activities
    • 1.5 Notable shops
    • 1.6 Slayer tasks added
  • 2 Unlocks
    • 2.1 Quests
    • 2.2 Achievement diary tasks
  • 3 Notable drops

Overview of area[edit | edit source]

Notable settlements[edit | edit source]

  • Gwenith
  • Iorwerth Camp
  • Lletya
  • Prifddinas
  • Tyras Camp
  • Zul-Andra

Restricted travel[edit | edit source]

The following travel options are restricted unless the appropriate area is unlocked:

  • The gate in Arandar leading to Kandarin
  • The entrance to the Mourner Headquarters near the Temple of Light
  • The Underground Pass exit to West Ardougne

Notable combat-related activities[edit | edit source]

  • A 'Rabbit'
  • Iorwerth Dungeon
  • The Gauntlet
  • Zulrah

Notable non-combat activities[edit | edit source]

  • Elven Crystal Chest
  • Lletya Fruit Tree Patch
  • Prifddinas Allotment Patch
  • Prifddinas Agility Course
  • Prifddinas Crystal implings
  • Prifddinas Hunter Grounds
  • Prifddinas house portal
  • Prifddinas Teak and Mahogany trees
  • Sacred Eel fishing
  • Zalcano

Notable shops[edit | edit source]

  • Sian's Ranged Weaponry
  • Iorwerth's Arms
  • Amlodd's Magical Supplies
  • Gwyn's Mining Emporium

Slayer tasks added[edit | edit source]

Unlocking Tirannwn will add the following tasks to your slayer list:

  • Bloodveld
  • Dark beast
  • Elf
  • Kurask
  • Nechryael
  • Waterfiend

Unlocks[edit | edit source]

The following quests and achievement diary tasks are automatically completed after unlocking the area.

Quests[edit | edit source]

  • Eagles' Peak
  • Song of the Elves
    • Mourning's End Part II
      • Mourning's End Part I
        • Big Chompy Bird Hunting
        • Sheep Herder
        • Roving Elves
          • Waterfall Quest
          • Regicide
            • Underground Pass
              • Biohazard
                • Plague City
    • Making History
      • Priest in Peril
      • The Restless Ghost

Achievement diary tasks[edit | edit source]

No achievement diary tasks are completed after unlocking Tirannwn

Notable drops[edit | edit source]

These items are highlighted as key drops from the area which are affected by the boosted drop rate granted by passive relics at tier 3 and tier 5.

rawContent:
The '''Tirannwn Area''' covers the entirety of [[Tirannwn]] along with the [[Temple of Light]] and the [[Underground Pass]]. Underground areas and [[instance|instanced areas]] with an entrance in the area are also included. 

==Overview of area==
===Notable settlements===
*[[Gwenith]]
*[[Iorwerth Camp]]
*[[Lletya]]
*[[Prifddinas]]
*[[Tyras Camp]]
*[[Zul-Andra]]

===Restricted travel===
The following travel options are restricted unless the appropriate area is unlocked:
*The gate in [[Arandar]] leading to [[Kandarin]]
*The entrance to the [[Mourner Headquarters]] near the Temple of Light
*The Underground Pass exit to [[West Ardougne]]

===Notable combat-related activities===
*[[Rabbit_(Prifddinas)|A 'Rabbit']]
*[[Iorwerth Dungeon]]
*[[The Gauntlet]]
*[[Zulrah]]

===Notable non-combat activities===
*[[Elven Crystal Chest]]
*[[Lletya]] Fruit Tree Patch
*Prifddinas Allotment Patch
*[[Prifddinas Agility Course]]
*Prifddinas [[Crystal implings]]
*Prifddinas Hunter Grounds
*Prifddinas house portal
*Prifddinas [[Teak]] and [[Mahogany trees]]
*[[Sacred Eel]] fishing
*[[Zalcano]]

===Notable shops===
*[[Sian's Ranged Weaponry]]
*[[Iorwerth's Arms]]
*[[Amlodd's Magical Supplies]]
*[[Gwyn's Mining Emporium]]

===Slayer tasks added===
Unlocking Tirannwn will add the following tasks to your slayer list:
*[[Bloodveld]]
*[[Dark beast]]
*[[Elf]]
*[[Kurask]]
*[[Nechryael]]
*[[Waterfiend]]

==Unlocks==
The following quests and achievement diary tasks are automatically completed after unlocking the area.
===Quests===
*[[Eagles' Peak]]
*[[Song of the Elves]]
**[[Mourning's End Part II]]
***[[Mourning's End Part I]]
****[[Big Chompy Bird Hunting]]
****[[Sheep Herder]]
****[[Roving Elves]]
*****[[Waterfall Quest]]
*****[[Regicide]]
******[[Underground Pass]]
*******[[Biohazard]]
********[[Plague City]]
**[[Making History]]
***[[Priest in Peril]]
***[[The Restless Ghost]]

===Achievement diary tasks===
No achievement diary tasks are completed after unlocking Tirannwn

==Notable drops==
These items are highlighted as key drops from the area which are affected by the boosted drop rate granted by passive relics at tier 3 and tier 5.
